inlet.digest: Buffer whose sample must be iterated

outlet.description: Sends a bang when the iteration has ended
The samples outlet outputs a list of samples (one for each buffer channel)

objarg.name: numbuffers
objarg.description: Sets the number of buffers to be iterated in parallel.

method.name: list/llll
method.description:
A list or llll in the first inlet is supposed to contain buffer names and will trigger the buffer processing and output the processed buffer names (depending on the naming attribute).
A number or an llll in the second inlet is expected to contain a iter parameter (depending on the ampunit) or an envelope (also see envampunit).

method.name: number
method.description: A number in the second inlet sets the iter parameter (depending on the ampunit).

attribute.name: iterationmode

entry.name: Inlets 1, 2, 3... (symbol)
entry.description: Buffer whose sample must be iterated.

entry.name: Outlet 1 (bang)
entry.description: Bang When Done. Sends a bang when the iteration has ended

entry.name: Outlets 2, 3, 4... (int/list)
entry.description: Samples. The samples outlet outputs a list of samples (one for each buffer channel)
